mapper.sql: a.SoCode as "soCode", a.SoSeq as "soSeq", a.moId as "moId", a.moCode as "moCode", a.MoClass as "moClass", a.startdate as "startdate", a.dueDate as "dueDate", a.cdepcode as "cdepcode", a.cdepname as "cdepname", a.createDate as "createTime", a.modid as "modid", a.sortSeq as "sortSeq", a.MoLotCode as "moLotCode", a.invcode as "cinvcode", a.cInvName as "cinvname", a.cinvstd as "cinvstd", a.cComUnitCode as "cComUnitCode", a.cComUnitName as "cComUnitName", a.Remark as "remark", a.qty as "qty", a.qualifiedInQty as "qualifiedInQty", a.status as "status"
